name: Demo - Todd Crumpleberry's Storybook Adventure
description:
Todd Crumpleberry's Storybook Adventure is an exploration-based adventure game. How you explore and interact with the world directly shapes the narrative.

This is a free playable demo while the full game is in development. Any feedback is much appreciated!

Keep an eye out for updates, I plan to expand this demo to have a lot more content as development moves forward.

Thanks for playing!

General Information:

  • OS Support: Windows and Mac OSX
  • Input Support: Mouse and Keyboard (a trackpad is doable, but a little tricky for combat)
  • Playtime: 5-10 minutes (full game will be 2-5 hours, based on player choices)
  • Content Warnings: Strong Language, Cartoon Violence (if this demo was a movie it would be PG-13)
